mapper.select: /* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.ApplypaymentMapper.findApplypayment */ SELECT ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ, ST.PROD_ID, PR.PROD_NAME, ST.USER_ID, EP.EMP_NAME, ST.CUST_ID, CU.CUST_NAME, ST.REQ_DATE, ST.PROD_AMT, ST.SALE_AMT, ST.INFLOW_CNT, ST.SALE_TOTAL_AMT, ST.REQ_GUBUN, ST.CONFIRM_AMT, ST.CONFIRM_RATE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_FROM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_FROM, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_TO, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_TO, ST.WORK_DAY, IFNULL(ST.INCENTIVE_RATE, 0) AS INCENTIVE_RATE, ST.ACCT_AMT, ST.REFUND_IND, ST.ATCH_ID, ST.STATUS, ST.TAX_IND, ST.PAY_YM FROM SETTLEMENT ST LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER CU ON ST.CUST_ID = CU.BIZ_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCTS PR ON ST.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND DATE_FORMAT(ST.REQ_DATE, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN PR.EFF_DATE_FROM AND PR.EFF_DATE_TO LEFT JOIN TB_EMP EP ON ST.USER_ID = EP.EMP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ST.USER_ID = #{loginUserId}
